programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: A cabaret singer witnesses a murder and goes undercover as a nun. In the convent, she is put in charge of coaching the choir, which she transforms into a toe-tapping rhythm group. programme.desc: In his own words, Sir Anthony Hopkins describes how a deeply troubled boy from Port Talbot, Wales, achieved two-time Oscar glory in Hollywood. programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: Strictly Come Dancing returns to the ballroom this Christmas, ready to captivate the nation with a celebration of dance and festive cheer. Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman host as six celebrities step into the spotlight, each hoping to impress the judges and become Christmas Champion 2025. Boy band Blue will deliver a special musical performance, and the Christmas cast take to the floor for two spectacular group dances.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: A situation escalates at The Vic for the Slaters, and the Beales and the Brannings prepare to sit down to a joint family Christmas dinner.

programme.title: Amandaland
programme.desc: Amanda and the family head to Aunt Joans country house, but the plans change when Mal and Anne tag along, and she struggles to recreate the magical Christmases she spent there as a child. Anne is in despair at being separated from her family, and Felicity is increasingly irritated by her sisters constant high spirits. Meanwhile, Mal sees a hidden photo that seems to reveal a deep family secret.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: The Mitchells help make Nigels Christmas extra special.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: Mrs Brown rediscovers the meaning of family as she gathers those closest to her together for a Christmas photo. Buster unveils another of his signature Christmas trees with maximum impact, and Cathy frets about what presents to buy everyone.

programme.desc: Rob Reiners portrait of a couple whose growing attraction toward each other threatens to disrupt their friendship.

programme.title: The Gruffalos Child

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish

programme.desc: In the Toy House kitchen, Mr Onion and Pepi Nana find the little toy tub. Little Nana wishes that the little toy tub was a great big tub. In Storyland, everybody enjoys a Rub-a-dub-dub song with the great big tub.

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Tiny has invited the Wols for a day out on the Clangers Planet. She has planned a whole lot of activities for them all. She is going to show them her bedcave, introduce them to everyone they havent met before, give them soup to eat and then end with a wonderful musical extravaganza. But she hadnt counted on the Wols curiosity and soon the Wols are leading Small and Tiny a merry chase. But alls well that ends well - at least until Major Clanger decides to join in the music.

programme.title: In the Night Garden
programme.desc: Igglepiggle discovers the stones, which Makka Pakka has most carefully tidied into a pattern. He accidentally knocks over the stones. He tries to put them back as they were, but somehow they are never quite right.

programme.desc: Its Christmas at Wood Green, The Animals Charity, and rescue dogs are hoping for a new home and family for keeps, from Michael the lurcher, to one-eyed Clarence and Bentley the portly pug.

programme.title: Terry Pratchetts The Abominable Snow Baby
programme.desc: A small town is thrown into disarray by the unexpected appearance of a 14-foot snow monster. The creature is rescued by the indomitable Granny and her grandson Albert, but not everyone is happy with the new arrangement.

programme.title: The Snowman and the Snowdog
programme.desc: The sequel to Raymond Briggss classic `The Snowman. When a young boy, Billy, and his mother move house, he discovers a box hidden under the floorboards of his bedroom.

programme.title: Were Going on a Bear Hunt
programme.desc: Following the Intrepid adventures of siblings Stan, Katie, Rosie, Max, the baby and Rufus the dog, who decide one day to `catch a big one and set off on an expedition in search of bears.

programme.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
programme.desc: A young girl named Sophie invites an anthropomorphised tiger over for an intimate tea party. He proceeds to drink all the tea and eat all the food.

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve and a little boy decides to make a snowman. During the night, the snowman comes to life and whisks the boy off to the North Pole for a meeting with a very important person.

programme.title: Father Christmas
programme.desc: Father Christmas decides its time for a well-earned holiday. Transforming his sleigh into a caravan, Santa sets off on a world trip, but he might have left it too late to prepare for next years Christmas.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe befriends the animal denizens of an urban jungle when he and Mrs Hoggett embark on a mission to save the farm.

programme.title: The Snowman and the Snowdog
programme.desc: The sequel to Raymond Briggss classic `The Snowman. When a young boy, Billy, and his mother move house, he discovers a box hidden under the floorboards of his bedroom.

programme.title: Mogs Christmas
programme.desc: Mog feels a little ignored during the Thomas familys Christmas preparations. When she spots the huge Christmas tree, she freaks out and climbs to the roof, where she refuses to move no matter how hard the family tries.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: Sequel in which nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier is asked to get back into her habit when her old friends at St Catherines Convent find difficulty in controlling a school filled with juvenile delinquents. Convincing everyone that Deloris is a nun is going to be a challenge in itself, especially with a group of incompetent monks trying to hinder their efforts.

programme.title: Frozen II
programme.desc: Elsa the Snow Queen has an extraordinary gift -- the power to create ice and snow. But no matter how happy she is to be surrounded by the people of Arendelle, Elsa finds herself strangely unsettled. After hearing a mysterious voice call out to her, Elsa travels to the enchanted forests and dark seas beyond her kingdom -- an adventure that soon turns into a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve and a little boy decides to make a snowman. During the night, the snowman comes to life and whisks the boy off to the North Pole for a meeting with a very important person.

programme.title: The Alternative Christmas Message
programme.desc: Channel 4s alternative to the Kings Christmas Day message.

programme.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
programme.desc: Kevin McAllister is once again accidentally separated from his parents after an airport mix-up sees him lost and alone in New York. Coincidentally, two familiar villains are also in town plotting their finest crime to date.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Ding dong merrily on pie! Deck the ovens and take a peep into the tent, as stars from Peep Show create biscuit decorations, a Boxing Day classic and their favourite moments in cake form.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: This bumper edition for Christmas takes a very merry look back at the best of the Box this year.

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Anna Scott is the most famous actress in the world, and William Thacker a second hand bookshop owner in Notting Hill. After colliding in the street they begin a relationship which is soon fraught with complications as the tabloid press hound Anna. William must then summon all his charm, ingenuity and patience if there is to be a happy ending.

programme.title: East Is East
programme.desc: In England during the 1970s, a traditional Pakistani shop owner loses control of his Anglicised offspring.

programme.title: East Is East
programme.desc: In England during the 1970s, a traditional Pakistani shop owner loses control of his Anglicised offspring.

programme.title: Andhadhun
programme.desc: A blind pianist finds himself at the center of a mystery.

programme.title: Mann
programme.desc: Priya wins a cruise, where she meets Dev and falls in love with him but, because each is bound to an arranged marriage, they part ways and promise to meet again after a year.

programme.title: Albela
programme.desc: A tourist guide falls in love with a woman he met at the airport, but she only has eyes for his best friend.

programme.title: Paheli
programme.desc: Kishanlal marries the beautiful Lachchi, but the day after the wedding, he leaves on business for five years. When Kishanlal reappears only a few days later, Lachchi is delighted, but this new Kishanlal is in fact a spirit who has taken the form of Lachchis husband, after having seen her by chance and fallen in love with her. Four years later, the real Kishanlal returns and the townsfolk must determine who is who.

programme.title: Dil
programme.desc: A man pretends to be a rich industrialist to improve his sons chances of marrying into wealth, but his plan backfires on him.

programme.title: Sultan
programme.desc: A middle-aged wrestling champion tries to make a comeback to represent India at the Olympics.

programme.title: Chak De India
programme.desc: After failing to score the winning goal, Kabir Khan, Captain of the Mens Hockey Team is blamed for the teams loss and fired. Years later he is given a chance to salvage his reputation, when he is offered the position as coach of the Womens Hockey Team.

programme.desc: After failing to score the winning goal, Kabir Khan, Captain of the Mens Hockey Team is blamed for the teams loss and fired. Years later he is given a chance to salvage his reputation, when he is offered the position as coach of the Womens Hockey Team.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Takes a Bath
programme.desc: As Joey agonises over his secret affection for Rachel, Monica mistakenly thinks that he is infatuated with Phoebe. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Absurd comedy about a likeable buffoon who turns the most ordinary situations into moments of excruciating embarrassment. Mr Bean rushes to his exam only to find out hes studied the wrong subject. He then goes to the beach but struggles to change into his swimming trunks discretely. Later on, he has difficulty attending a church service without drawing attention to himself.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to give a busker some money until he realises he has no change, while afterwards he goes shopping but gets carried away. Later, he treats himself to a birthday dinner but is disappointed with his dish. Finally, Mr Bean attends a royal film premiere in order to meet the Queen, with disastrous results.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to a swimming pool but finds himself terrified of the high diving board; afterwards, he must try several imaginative ways to get out of the car park when he doesnt have enough money to pay. He then demonstrates the proper way to make a sandwich whilst out at the park. Finally, when Mr Bean and his girlfriend go on a date to watch a horror movie he teases her for being scared, until the film actually starts.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a portable television but cant get it to work properly. Then, when his camera is stolen, he must identify the suspect in a police line up. Afterwards, he attends a magic show and disco with his girlfriend but ends up embarrassing her.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean rushes to the dentists office after oversleeping, then helps a boy fix his remote-controlled toy boat, and later is menaced by a wasp while having a picnic.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean resuscitates a heart attack victim at the bus stop, has problems mailing a letter after accidentally swallowing the stamp, and decides to go on holiday.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean treats himself to a weekend at a posh hotel where he manages to get himself into one embarrassing situation after another.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean throws a New Years Eve party, finds some bargains at a sale, and creates havoc when decorates his room.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the funfair but is surprised to find that a guest has joined him for the day.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes Christmas shopping, conducts a Salvation Army band, and has Christmas dinner with his long-suffering girlfriend.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Sharon Osbourne hands over her phone to play Send to All, and Michael wakes up `Strictly Scrooge Craig Revel Horwood in a special Christmassy Midnight Gameshow. One lucky audience member receives the best Christmas present ever in the shape of a huge surprise, plus, there will be a spectacular festive performance from the Unexpected Star of the Show.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler has a brief fling with Rachels boss Joanna which leaves him handcuffed without his trousers in her office. Meanwhile, Joey can only afford one book in an encyclopaedia set, and Monica caters a party for her mother.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ballroom Dancing
programme.desc: Joey argues with the building superintendent Treegar and ends up having to help him practise ballroom dancing. Meanwhile, Ross and Chandler cant get out of their gym membership even though neither of them wants to exercise, and Phoebe loses her massage job for kissing a client.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Library Book
programme.desc: Ross is elated that the university library contains his doctoral dissertation, but he is shocked to discover that it is located in a remote corner frequently used by students having sex. Elsewhere, the tables are turned on Joey when Erin is the one to just want sex and not a relationship.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Big Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel runs into an old sorority sister with whom she once shared a passionate encounter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross and Rachels attempt to explain how they wound up in bed together quickly descends into an argument over who seduced who, until Ross shocks the room by announcing that he has the whole encounter on video. Meanwhile, Monica and Chandler return from their honeymoon, excited at the prospect of socialising with another just-married couple they met on the flight home.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross learns that a pregnant Rachel wants to move out and find a place of her own, so he suggests a vacancy in his building. Then he learns that the elderly occupant is not quite dead yet. Meanwhile, Phoebe is ecstatic when Eric dumps her twin sister Ursula and chooses her instead, and Monica comes unhinged when she suspects that her new maid is stealing her jeans, among other things.

programme.title: Michael McIntyre: Hello Wembley!
programme.desc: Stand-up performance recorded at Wembley Arena during Michael McIntyres 2009 sell-out 54 date UK tour. The show features Michaels unique take on life - from getting to grips with wine menus and restaurant etiquette, to obsessive Wii playing and condiment hierarchy in the kitchen cupboard.

programme.title: Michael McIntyre: Live and Laughing
programme.desc: Michael McIntyre, star of his eponymous `BBC1 Comedy Roadshow, performs his own stand-up show in front of a sell-out crowd at the world-famous Hammersmith Apollo. Michael regales the audience with tales of driving, child-rearing and `the man drawer.

programme.title: Lee Evans: Big Live at the O2
programme.desc: Recorded at the end of Lee Evans record-breaking tour, which played to over 500,000 fans across the UK. Its infectious stand-up from the master of physical observational comedy at the height of his powers.

programme.title: Lee Evans: XL Tour Live
programme.desc: Lee Evans, the nations best-loved comedian, brings his hilarious tour to Wales. Enjoy his energetic performance and a truly unbelievable finale as he performs to over 4,000 fans in Cardiff.

programme.desc: Homesteading has exploded in popularity, with families moving to more remote areas and with bigger ambition than ever before. But for the rookie off-gridder striving for self-sufficiency, extreme plans often lead to extreme problems.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Tensions explode on the Tomcod Claim; Chris takes radical action against a dredge he believes is jumping his claim; when a massive explosion blows a hole in the Mistress, Kris scrambles to save his livelihood.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Four gold dredges and their driven but eccentric crews risk everything to hunt for gold on the bottom of the frigid Bering Sea before winter sets in. They rely on custom-built rigs, some barely seaworthy, for their perilous journeys.

programme.title: Kindig Customs
programme.desc: In high school, Daves wife Charity drove the wheels off her 67 Chevelle; when the couple started their business, they sold the car with the hopes of one day getting another; the crew works to get it ready.

programme.title: Kindig Customs
programme.desc: The Chevelle makes it through paint and into the assembly area, where it comes back to life; new upholstery gives the car the real upgrade it needs, and just like that, Dave is the hero of the family again.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Jake battles a hurricane in the fleets smallest boat while Keith orders crew over the rail to avoid capsizing.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: When processors shut down due to outbreaks, Sig bets he can zero in on a rare crab motorway before theres no place to deliver.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: A Colorado war veterans family and stable of horses are ravaged by hurricane-force winds that make subsistence all but impossible. But when the Raneys learn of their larger dream, they pull out the stops with some of their most creative builds yet.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Oregon homesteaders find their dream in jeopardy following a near-fatal accident; the Raneys face a daunting rescue where a dilapidated bridge has cut them off from their land, and strict building regulations force them to get creative.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: An early 20s couple struggle to keep their homestead afloat in torrential Texas weather. But the Raneys face a tense and daunting rescue to save the rain-devastated cabin and soggy livestock shelters under threat of storms and tornado warnings.

programme.title: Expedition From Hell: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: A near-deadly case of dengue fever almost stops Mickey before hes arrested at gunpoint and imprisoned in Brazil. Three months of missing footage leads to questions about his escape and the expeditions end.

programme.title: In the Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: This series reveals recent natural disasters as they happened in real-time through footage captured by eyewitnesses who found themselves in the wrong place at the right time and boldly held up their camera phones to capture the eye of the storm.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: Josh Gates heads to the Wild West in search of the hidden loot heisted by infamous lawmen turned criminals, the Dalton Gang. Re-tracing the Gangs last steps and investigating their final, deadly shoot-out, Josh chases a fortune worth millions today.

programme.title: Moonshiners
programme.desc: Mark and Digger team up with Danielle Parton to run the first moonshine in decades on her legendary family property. Tim heads to the highlands of Jalisco to harvest blue agave to run Tequila.

programme.title: Expedition From Hell: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: A near-deadly case of dengue fever almost stops Mickey before hes arrested at gunpoint and imprisoned in Brazil. Three months of missing footage leads to questions about his escape and the expeditions end.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Josh Gates leads his team of investigators, Phil Torres and Heather Amaro, as they travel the world exploring the mysterious and unexplained.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: After Hurricane Helene obliterates a 100-year-old farmhouse in NC, a once self-sufficient family is left with nothing. The Raneys face their most urgent mission yet: to rebuild a fourth-generation homestead, making it 100% self-sustainable.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.sub-title: Pedal to the Gold Metal: Part 1
programme.desc: As the end of the mining season looms, the fleet has its richest week to date. Shawn unleashes a full force of equipment inland, Joes marathon dives hit the jackpot, and Chris fights against powerful currents to reach his payday.

programme.title: Kindig Customs
programme.desc: Its no secret that while Kev can appreciate cars of all shapes and sizes, deep down, hes a truck guy. When a truck show comes through town, KevDogg shows Dave what is what with all the great builds that have descended on Salt Lake.

programme.title: Kindig Customs
programme.desc: Since launching the project in 2021, Dave Kindigs CF1 has been a smashing success; never one to rest on his laurels, Dave has decided its time to move on to the next generation of the car, and this one will be adding the option of a Carson top.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Fishing crews on the Bering Sea endure mortal peril and intense discomfort during crab season, with 12-metre waves, 318-kilogram crab pots that can easily crush a careless crewman, and freezing temperatures around the clock.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Duane and Chad Ollinger return to Blind Frog Ranch, armed with cutting-edge tech, to unearth $3 billion in hidden treasure.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Searching for the hidden entrance to the cave system, the team uncovers an ancient vent shaft above the Energy Zone. But an explosion triggers an underground tsunami that threatens to flood the cave system.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: When an underground tsunami floods the cavern system, Duane and his team attempt to breach it from higher ground -- discovering evidence of Aztec artefacts and a crucial clue to the Lost Rhodes mine.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: After uncovering a bar of gold at the Bead Site, Chad and James set out to research where it might have come from. With trespassers still threatening the ranch, their discovery sets them on the path of the fabled Lost Rhodes Mine.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: The team tries a dangerous manoeuvre on the trail of the Lost Rhoades Mine to access the Mormon Eye cave. Back on the ranch, Duane discovers more poacher sites.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates investigates conspiracy theories, including new discoveries suggesting the Titanic was sunk by more than just an iceberg, the true story behind the death of Harry Houdini, and lost Civil War Gold that spawned a lawsuit against the FBI.

programme.title: In the Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: In the summer of 2024, dozens of cameras captured a rare outbreak of shark attacks along Americas Gulf Coast. Told exclusively through first-hand accounts of victims and eyewitnesses, nobody has seen all these perspectives unfold in real time.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: With word of an urgent lead, Josh jets to Poland to join in the opening of a secret Nazi tunnel system dug into a dormant volcano. Josh helps a local team tear away a stone wall built by the Germans in the last days of World War 2.

programme.title: Moonshiners
programme.desc: When Josh moves into a remote farmhouse, Tickle and the Laws help devise an underground transport operation.

programme.sub-title: Kicking Bishop Brennan Up the Arse
programme.desc: Ted, having lost a bet to Dick Byrne, has to kick Bishop Brennan in the behind as his forfeit. Coincidentally, Bishop Brennan and his side-kick, Father Jessup, arrive at the Craggy Island Parochial House to see the image of the Bishop which has miraculously appeared on the skirting board of Teds spare room. Ted now has no excuse but to carry out the forfeit.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon heads to Long Beach, California, to save Ninos, an Italian family restaurant that was opened in 1958 and is now under the misguided leadership of the eldest son, Nino. Younger brother Michael and sister Carina point the finger of blame for the restaurants failings directly at Nino, and their 78-year-old mother Inge is desperate for Nino to turn the business around.

programme.title: Father Ted

But the law - and especially Sam Rockwells hot-headed deputy - dont take kindly to the provocation. And the townsfolk are on their side. But Mildred doesnt care about ruffling a few feathers. programme.title: James Martins British Adventure

Their journey begins with an incredible tour of the castle grounds complete with awe inspiring views. James kicks off the cooking with his venison with beetroot and blackberries in the castles walled garden. Next Tom Kitchin dusts of his wellies and heads in to the woods for a bit of wild mushroom foraging.

programme.title: James Martins British Adventure

Once theyve reached Edinburgh, Tom shares his local knowledge by visiting one of his favourite suppliers, Welch Fishmongers. He learns the secret to their amazing smoked salmon which James uses for a salmon mousse with cucumber and dill pickle and melba toast.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure

Lisa is paying a visit to The Black Swan.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Dish of the Day
programme.desc: Nigel Slater shows how one can, with a bit of culinary creativity, turn the contents of his weekly shop into seven delicious dishes - one for every day of the week. Here, Nigel shows ways to cook with an abundance of ingredients, whether a glut from the garden or a special offer in the shops. He proves there are creative ways to have delicious food every day of the week.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Dish of the Day
programme.desc: Cook Nigel Slater shows how the shrinking violets of the kitchen can help make cooking shine as he turns some often overlooked staples into sensational dishes, with a recipe for every day of the week. These include haddock chowder, crumbed lamb steak with buttered swede mash, and fennel feta linguine.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Dish of the Day
programme.desc: Nigel proves that the food we buy week in week out can always be exciting as he introduces us to some new delicious flavour combinations to reinvigorate the weekly shop. Recipes include ricotta beefburger, sesame seed salmon with mirin and lemon and thyme cake.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Dish of the Day
programme.desc: Nigel cooks seven delicious dishes, with simple recipes that make quality ingredients go further, proving we can treat ourselves without breaking the bank. Including chicken and leek pie, mushroom medley and raspberry and cinnamon meringue.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Dish of the Day
programme.desc: Nigel shows that sometimes simple cookery is simply the best, with clever recipes that make the most of the weekly shop - one pan at a time. These include herby artichoke stew, chicken in cider, and compost crumble.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Dish of the Day
programme.desc: Nigel finds ways to get the most out of the ingredients from the weekly shop - from getting the most out of a cut of ribs to using every last peel of his butternut squash. Meals include butternut squash soup with crisps, rib ragout and cherry chocolate iced rice.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Dish of the Day
programme.desc: Nigel shows us how surprisingly versatile the ingredients in our weekly shop can be, proving that by trying something different in the kitchen it is possible to make our food suit our mood. Including duck and citrus salad, hot yoghurt steak and chocolate beetroot cake.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Dish of the Day

As Barnaby abandons his Christmas lunch with the in-laws to investigate, it seems as though ghosts from the past are haunting the household.

programme.title: Vera

programme.title: Lewis

Lewis is drawn into the fragile but glamorous world of the Rattenbury family, and finds himself unprepared for the secrets that the Rattenburys are fighting to keep hidden.

programme.title: Queen - Live In Rio - 1985
programme.desc: Queen opens the Rock in Rio festival with hits including `Love of My Life, `Keep Yourself Alive, and `Its a Hard Life.

programme.title: Queen: Days of Our Lives
programme.desc: In 1971, four university students got together to form a band. Since then, that certain band called Queen have released 26 albums and sold over 300 million records worldwide. The popularity of Freddie Mercury, Brian May, Roger Taylor and John Deacon is stronger than ever and their story is a remarkable one.

programme.title: Isle Of Wight Festival 2025
programme.sub-title: Olly Murs At Isle Of Wight Festival
programme.desc: Musicians perform at the Isle Of Wight Festival, one of the UKs oldest music festivals. The event is hosted at Seaclose Park, Newport, in June 2025 and headlined by Sting, Justin Timberlake, and Stereophonics.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.sub-title: In Terms of Winning and Losing

programme.desc: Robb presents himself to Walder Frey; Edmure meets his bride; Jon faces a harsh test; Bran discovers a new gift; Daario and Jorah debate; House Frey joins with House Tully.

programme.desc: Alan Cummings tour of the UK continues as he uncovers more secrets in its urban areas. This week, hes in Brighton where he travels from the toy museum to the Royal Pavilion.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The eponymous commando is coaxed out of retirement to act as a guide to a group of aid workers on a humanitarian mission in Burma. However, when the Burmese army captures the group, he mounts a violent one-man rescue mission to try to save the missionaries.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock is trying to take down Carlton Drake, the notorious and brilliant founder of the Life Foundation. While investigating one of Drakes experiments, Eddies body merges with the alien Venom -- leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Victor Sullivan recruits Nathan Drake to help him recover a 500-year-old fortune. What starts out as a heist becomes a globe-trotting, white-knuckle race to reach the prize before the ruthless Santiago Moncada can get his hands on it.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Discovering that his most-famous machine is now creating animal/vegetable hybrids, inventor Flint Lockwood and his friends venture forth to save the world from tacodiles, shrimpanzees and other creatures.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: The Queen of Hearts has outlawed Christmas! Can St Nick, Alice, the Mad Hatter and March Hare save the day? Animation with Emilia Clarke, Gerard Butler and Simone Ashley. (2024, 90 mins)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World

programme.title: The Terminal

Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: The story of photographer Elizabeth `Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, bankruptcy looms over the company that Enzo Ferrari and his wife built 10 years earlier. He decides to roll the dice and wager it all on the iconic Mille Miglia, a treacherous 1,000-mile race across Italy.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Hardings life and legacy instantly become tarnished as shes forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: Joker: Folie Ã Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: After discovering that he can travel through time, a young man uses his ability to win the woman of his dreams and save his friend from professional disaster.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an unsophisticated single mother who stumbles upon an environmental cover-up. While working for a lawyer, she is puzzled by an old case and decides to do some research of her own. She discovers that a chemical company knowingly polluted the local area, and with the help of the lawyer launches a class action to sue the company for damages.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Mollys Game
programme.desc: Molly Bloom runs the worlds most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested by the FBI. Her only ally is defence lawyer Charlie Jaffey, who learns that there is much more to Molly than the tabloids lead people to believe.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: A Minecraft Movie
programme.desc: A mysterious portal pulls four misfits into the Overworld, a bizarre, cubic wonderland that thrives on imagination. To get back home, theyll have to master the terrain while embarking on a magical quest with an unexpected crafter named Steve.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: Chuck Chuck Baby
programme.desc: Helen lives with her ex-husband, his 20-year-old girlfriend, their new baby and his dying mother. Her dreary life is interrupted when her schoolgirl crush arrives back in town.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team race against time to find the Entity, a rogue artificial intelligence that can destroy mankind.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie and a living woman sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporations locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
programme.desc: Survivors of a global plague are besieged in Las Vegas. The Umbrella Corporation wants Alice for her DNA. If the scientists dont get her, the zombies will.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice continues her journey to find survivors after the world is hit by a virus infection which turns its victims in the Undead. With help from an old friend, Alice leads the survivors to Los Angeles, which she believes is a safe haven. However, its all a trap set up by the Umbrella Corporation, who want her dead.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: New allies and old friends aid Alice in her worldwide search for those responsible for the T-virus outbreak that continues to turn humans into flesh-eating zombies.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Alice travels to the Hive in Raccoon City to prevent the evil Umbrella Corp. from wiping out the last remaining survivors of the zombie apocalypse.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A small group of survivors try to stay a step ahead of the vicious, virus-infected humans that have overrun London.

programme.title: Zombie Town
programme.desc: Two teens uncover a centuries-old secret when they decide to watch a zombie movie on Halloween night. However, when the townspeople themselves turn into the undead, they must track down an infamous filmmaker and break the curse before its too late.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish library clerk working for a CIA front is hunted after he stumbles across a covert intelligence operation. Returning from lunch, he finds the entire office massacred. Using his codename Condor, he contacts the CIA, but when an agent tries to kill him, he kidnaps a stranger off the street to ensure his survival and attempts to turn the tables on those who want him dead.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A mild mannered, socially weird government accountant moonlights as a highly trained, and deadly assassin.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Oceans gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Dannys old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Dom Cobb is is an absolute pro at stealing ideas from peoples minds during the dream state but now he is being challenged to perform the reverse: plant an idea in the mind of a target. The ultimate in corporate espionage, and much is at stake if Dom cant pull it off.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Harlem drug dealer Frank Lucas rises to power in corrupt 1970s New York, equalling and surpassing the notorious Mafia families with the reach of his empire. On the other side of the law, honest cop Richie Roberts dedicates himself to taking down `the most dangerous man walking the streets. Lucas acts with impunity, smuggling heroin into the US in the coffins of American soldiers killed in Vietnam.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish library clerk working for a CIA front is hunted after he stumbles across a covert intelligence operation. Returning from lunch, he finds the entire office massacred. Using his codename Condor, he contacts the CIA, but when an agent tries to kill him, he kidnaps a stranger off the street to ensure his survival and attempts to turn the tables on those who want him dead.

programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.desc: A mild mannered, socially weird government accountant moonlights as a highly trained, and deadly assassin.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven

programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. programme.title: Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: When James whisks Agatha away on a seaside trip to work on his new book, the last thing she expects is to end up in a town called Snoth-on-Sea. The getaway goes from bad to worse when theyre greeted by protesters at the hotel, and then an obnoxious fellow guest is murdered-and the local police consider Agatha the prime suspect.

programme.title: Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: Agatha, Roy, and Sarah attend the Fruit Preserve Festival, where Charles and James are two of the judges for the jam competition, and DCI Wilkes is one of the competitors. After a few rounds of tastings, however, the judges start to act out, hallucinating-and Dr Stevens, believing she can fly, jumps from the roof. DCI Wilkes employs Agatha to find the killer, as hes currently in the frame.

programme.title: Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: The stage is all set for the wedding of the year between James and his Welsh fiancee, Eirwen, but nothing ever goes to plan in Carsely.
